A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I really don't understand what all the hate is about.
Yes\, the first act is a little messy in places\, but it really improves.
Sure\, the wild fan theories of the internet didn't turn out to be true\, but who's fault is that? It's a lose-lose situation. 
Correct fan-theories = predictability. Wrong fan-theories = Dissapointement
The fact that the audience score for this movie is nearly the same as TFM is not right. Hopefully\, once people get over the fact that Snoke isn't the pear from Attack of The Clones\, people will accept that this is\, in my opinion\, a good (not perfect\, but good) movie\, the score will become a little more appropriate.
